attributes.action: The Government should legislate to remove tax havens and tax avoidance schemes
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned believe that the Prime Minister of this country has no place in commenting on the morals of others, especially in the light of his own showing at the Leveson Inquiry.

We believe that the Government should show consistency regarding tax affairs and, where tax avoidance schemes exist, pass laws to remove them. They should start with the  UK-government approved tax haven of Jersey, and should not tolerate the use of any tax avoidance schemes amongst the millionaires in Cabinet.
